The website ILoveNativeAmericans: us insisted to a commenter that the claim was real and was on TV, despite evidence suggesting it is a fake news outlet.
The story falsely quoted President Trump: with no record of him actually making such statements about Native Americans.
The claim originated from a parody site: Postillon.com, which explicitly states that everything on their site is satire and made-up, further undermining the authenticity of the claim.
